Articles.Content:
I think I saw something about new graphics and whatnot. Do any of the settings in game make it offload partially to the GPU over CPU in a way that would give less overhead to the massive single CPU thread used for the ship. I'm trying to fly a large ship. Does anything besides the lowest settings give extra performance?

Or do any of the graphics settings use the GPU instead of the CPU to allow better graphics without harming the ship performance of larger vessels?
